column4: Hi, what's the easiest way of copying the raw data from a Ubuntu partition onto a networked Windows computer?
dd is for entire partition tho
dd is more raw tho bro
on the other pc have is listening tho on that same port
go with giles advice and make sure unmount the partition first
make sure ur firewall is off and AV disabled :)
keep in mind that linux file systems wont be any use on a windowz pc as well
Oh good, I'll look at netcat for windows. The destination is windows because I want to make a backup before the HD crashed for good :)
ohhh ok in that case then yes
sounds like u really want to use clonezilla tho ... its much easier to impliment backup and restore
if ur using fat32 then  u will have to break apart ur data into 2 gig segments.... just use clonezilla dude.... it makes it easier
u can use samba or ssh copying with clonezilla
